title: Account loss
body:
I had a account I made a while ago, but I don't have access to the e-mail and I forgot my password. I put many day's and a lot of time into this account. I was wondering if any Riot support could help me change the e-mail over to my current e-mail I have the account name as well as the Summoner name.
I don't want to put the account name in the post i would like it if you could send me a e-mail that would be perfect.
E-mail: darkhousegamingtv@gmail.com

replies.body: Please submit an account recovery [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to regain access to your account. If you can provide enough information to prove you are the original owner of the account they should be able to help you out.
I am currently doing that right now.

We'd like to help you recover your account!  I was able to locate your ticket, and confirm that it's been escalated to our account recovery team.  They will respond to your ticket as soon as possible!  Keep in mind that replying to the ticket can bump it back to the bottom, so it's important to just hang tight for now.  

In the meantime, I recommend going over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation for anything you might be asked.  Good luck!a
